One of the other prisoners were sacrificed. I could hear their screams from my cell...
LanguageData.ReviaRaceThoughtSacrificedNegative.stage: One of our colonists sacrificed a corpse to the blood god. This is disturbing.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceThoughtSacrificedPositive.stage: For the glory of Skarne! Blood for the blood god! Skulls for the skull throne!
